Iâ€™m convinced the thought that fills my mind most of the time is just a complex of [reactions](reactions.md) to the strange world Iâ€™m living in. Creative [urges](urges-1.md) struggle to redirect my mind to what I donâ€™t see, to what might be.

The web has changed but there remain remnants of what it once was in terms of personal sites. I track some of those remnants, curating such sites (which are still active, or when Iâ€™m lucky, new), hoping to somehow keep my original vision of the web intact. Itâ€™s a tough road to drive on but Iâ€™ve got a decent set of wheels with a few bells and whistles and more important, I enjoy the driving.

I want to deal with whatâ€™s possible, not wallow is whatâ€™s already taken place and left its ugly mark.
Iâ€™m tickled youâ€™re here reading this. I may not know you nor get feedback but thatâ€™s okay. I still have a chance to touch you in some way with what I share â€“ what could be better than that!
